description: Their best shoe for a water and sun based lifestyle. Ultra-fine ripstop mesh breathes deeply while keeping debris out. Their level footbed, wider toe-box and sticky G® Rubber outsoles promote ninja-like performance in slippery places.
name: Astral Loyak AC - Mens

specs.value: True to size (For half size, size up)
SUP, Training, Sailing, Fishing. Not recommended for heavy whitewater use
Ultra-fine ripstop mesh, with TPU reinforcements to guard against abrasion
Drop-in, 7mm thick 45 C closed cell EVA Foam with massage pods
Flex-Grip™ is non-marking, draining, super flexible, razor siped, and has 3 mm lugs. Made with G.15™; their sticky, high abrasion compound
